content: * the perfect little bag for daily walks felting is always fun though it can sometimes get a bit wild which is why i love how this mini bag keeps everything cute and simple add a few playful color stripes and it s instantly a vibe * the bag is worked in the round from the top down to form the body followed by the base a patch pocket and two handles are knit separately and sewn on afterward finally felt the bag to your preferred size for a soft and sturdy finish **finished size before/after felting without handles ** height 18 cm → 14 cm diameter 20 cm → 13 cm **suggested yarn** any feltable yarn non-superwash 100% wool recommended **suggested needles** circular needles 4 5 mm us 7 40 cm 16 in in length double-pointed needles 4 5 mm us 7 or use a long circular needle for the magic loop technique **gauge ** 16 sts × 22 row = 10 × 10 cm 4 × 4 in in stockinette stitch on 4 5 mm us 7 needles before felting
